answers.author: Jaymes Vettraino
answers.text:
Are you generally familiar with the area?  Having managed and lived in the Lehigh Valley for a number of years, the area is great.  Generally, really good people.  With the revitalization of Bethlehem, especially the south side of the City and Hellertown's proximity to Lehigh University, the Borough has a lot of going for it.  Also, Crossroads pizza, is the best pizza I've ever had!  I don't know any of the current local politics, but if you would like to discuss the Lehigh Valley area in general, please feel free to email me, jvettraino@ci.rochester.mi.us

author: Tracey Shiflett
text:
I have a job interview in Hellertown PA on Tuesday and the Borough Council has challenged candidates to learn as much as possible about the Town for the interview.  I was told "no holds barred" on how I learned about the Borough.
I have spoken with the current Borough Manager and several other people about the community. I would appreciate any information from ICMA members are willing to share.
title: Hellertown PA information
